item.title: JavaScript Decorators for Declarative and Readable Code
item.description: Decorators in JavaScript are now in stage 2. They allow us to alter the definition of a class, method, or a property. There are already a few neat libraries which provide decorators and make our life easier by allowing us to write more declarative code with better performance characteristics. In this blog post I’ll share a few decorators which I’m using on a daily basis…
